name: TicoDesign
tagline: Specialists in design and web hosting
description:
Web Design, Web Programming, Web Marketing, Web Hosting and  Domain Registration are the main services we offer for personal use to, small, medium and large companies.
The creation of a web project is not only to design a web page but to provide the client with all the necessary tools for opening and managing a business on the internet, as well as creating a functional environment that generates the correct results for our clients.
¡We really enjoy our work!
